Explanation: The bug in the buggy code is that it is shifting the first element to the last position in every iteration of the loop. This causes the array to be filled with the first element after the loop ends. Generated Test cases 1-4 (4/11) should pass the buggy code as they have less than 2 elements, so the loop doesn't run. Test cases 5-11 (7/11) should fail the buggy code as they have more than 2 elements and the loop runs, causing the bug to appear.
